name: xreqled
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(c0, cxr), wceq(c0, c1))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(w0, c0[≤]c1, c0 ∈ ℝ*, c0 = c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wceq(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wceq(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wceq(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cxr))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))

comment: Equality implies 'less than or equal to'. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 17-Aug-2020.)
